Description.enUS:
Mystical Hero, adept at disrupting spells and dealing large amounts of fire damage. Can learn Soul Burn, Summon Lava Spawn, Incinerate and Volcano.

Attacks land and air units.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders your units to move to the target area while ignoring enemy units and attacks. Issuing a move order onto a target unit will cause your unit to follow the target using move orders.
Orders your units to stop whatever order they were previously given. Units that have been told to stop will attack enemy units and move to engage nearby enemies.
Orders your units to stand where they are and attack units that are within range. When on Hold Position your units will not chase down enemy units that run away, nor move to engage ranged attackers.

Orders your units to continually move from their current position to the targeted area until given another command. Units on patrol will move to engage enemy units that come within range. Issuing a patrol order onto a target unit will cause your unit to imitate the targeted unit's behavior.

Orders your units to move to the target area and attack any enemy units they see on the way. If you order them to attack a specific unit, your units will ignore other enemy units and will attack the targeted unit until it is destroyed.

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1
Opens the abilities menu and allows you to assign unused points to the Heroes' abilities.
Stops the unit from auto-acquiring enemies, allowing it to Shadowmeld and remain unseen at night.

Teleports the Hero and any of its nearby troops to your highest level town hall, or a friendly town hall if you don't have one.

Consumes x1.

Wreaths an enemy unit in magical flames which cause 7.14 damage per second, prevent the casting of spells, and reduce attack damage by 50%.
Lasts 14 seconds.

Summons a Lava Spawn, a resilient and deadly fire creature. As a Lava Spawn deals damage, it consumes the flesh of its target, thereby fueling its fires and eventually splitting into two healthy Lava Spawns.

Has 425 hit points and deals 11 - 27 damage.
Lasts 70 seconds.

Attacks ground and air units.","Summons a Lava Spawn, a resilient and deadly fire creature. As a Lava Spawn deals damage, it consumes the flesh of its target, thereby

Each attack made is enhanced with living flames that cling to the target. These flames add 1 damage on the first attack, twice as much on the second attack, three times as much on the third attack, etc.

If a unit dies while under this effect, it is incinerated, causing up to 30 damage to all nearby hostile units.

Each attack made is enhanced with living flames that cling to the target. These flames add 2 damage on the first attack, twice as much on the second attack, three times as much on the third attack, etc.

If a unit dies while under this effect, it is incinerated, causing up to 45 damage to all nearby hostile units.

Each attack made is enhanced with living flames that cling to the target. These flames add 3 damage on the first attack, twice as much on the second attack, three times as much on the third attack, etc.

If a unit dies while under this effect, it is incinerated, causing up to 60 damage to all nearby hostile units.

Causes the ground to erupt into a massive Volcano. Every 5 seconds, a wave of molten rocks is hurled from the Volcano at nearby ground units and buildings, causing 100 damage to each target and stunning it for 2 seconds. Buildings take 2 times more damage from molten rocks than units do.
Lasts 35 seconds.
Drops the current un-issued order and allows you to select a different order.

Wreaths an enemy unit in magical flames which cause damage over time, prevent the casting of spells, and reduce attack damage by 50%.

Level 1 - 100 damage over 14 seconds.
Level 2 - 225 damage over 16 seconds.
Level 3 - 375 damage over 18 seconds.

Soul Burn lasts roughly half as long on Heroes.

"Summons a Lava Spawn, a resilient and deadly fire creature. As a Lava Spawn deals damage, it consumes the flesh of its target, eventually splitting into two healthy Lava Spawns.
Lasts 70 seconds.

Level 1 - 425 hit points, 11 - 27 damage.
Level 2 - 550 hit points, 21 - 45 damage.
Level 3 - 700 hit points, 32 - 56 damage.

Attacks gr

Each attack made is enhanced with living flames that cling to the target. These flames add a small amount of damage on the first attack, twice as much on the second attack, three times as much on the third attack, etc.

If a unit dies while under this effect, it is incinerated, causing significant damage to all nearby hostile units.

Level 1 - 1 bonus damage, 30 incineration damage.
Level 2 - 2 bonus damage, 45 incineration damage.
Level 3 - 3 bonus damage, 60 incineration damage.

Causes the ground to erupt into a massive Volcano. Every 5 seconds, a wave of molten rocks is hurled from the Volcano at nearby ground units and buildings, causing 100 damage to each target and stunning it for 2 seconds. Buildings take 2 times more damage from molten rocks than units do.
Lasts 35 seconds.

- Each point increases hit points by 25
- Each point increases hit point regeneration

- Every 3 points increase armor by 1
- Each point increases attack speed

- Each point increases mana by 15
- Each point increases mana regeneration
Orders your units to move to the target area while ignoring enemy units and attacks. Issuing a move order onto a target unit will cause your unit to follow the target using move orders.
Orders your units to stop whatever order they were previously given. Units that have been told to stop will attack enemy units and move to engage nearby enemies.
Orders your units to stand where they are and attack units that are within range. When on Hold Position your units will not chase down enemy units that run away, nor move to engage ranged attackers.

Orders your units to continually move from their current position to the targeted area until given another command. Units on patrol will move to engage enemy units that come within range. Issuing a patrol order onto a target unit will cause your unit to imitate the targeted unit's behavior.

Orders your units to move to the target area and attack any enemy units they see on the way. If you order them to attack a specific unit, your units will ignore other enemy units and will attack the targeted unit until it is destroyed.
Stops the unit from auto-acquiring enemies, allowing it to Shadowmeld and remain unseen at night.

Teleports the Hero and any of its nearby troops to your highest level town hall, or a friendly town hall if you don't have one.

Has 425 hit points and deals 11 - 27 damage.
Lasts 70 seconds.
